channel.title: What do you guys think of this webhost?

item.title: What do you guys think of this webhost?
item.dc:creator: @mattr91 mattr91
item.description:
@mattr91 wrote:

[quote=“D3i7y, post:11, topic:538612”]i have 3 websites & 5VPS but if you plan on anything resource consuming on the shared hosting i went over 25% a few times and they gave me a discount because i had so many things running at there site. they are always doing stuff for holidays and they do not make you commit for a year like other places of the same quality.

I have never hosted anything like rsps/botnet panels/JDB but i am sure they will cancel you very very quickly. So if you are hosting rsps i would not recommend it.

Anything on the legal side… enjoy your amazing palace for your website.[/quote]

I have nothing to do with Rsps anymore it’s been 4 Years lol. I was asking because I keep getting downtime. The servers have been down 4-5 times this week and I have used 6GBP bandwidth in less than 2 weeks I had to upgrade

Read full topic
item.source: What do you guys think of this webhost?

item.title: What do you guys think of this webhost?
item.dc:creator: @D3i7y D3i7y
item.description:
@D3i7y wrote:

i have 3 websites & 5VPS but if you plan on anything resource consuming on the shared hosting i went over 25% a few times and they gave me a discount because i had so many things running at there site. they are always doing stuff for holidays and they do not make you commit for a year like other places of the same quality.

I have never hosted anything like rsps/botnet panels/JDB but i am sure they will cancel you very very quickly. So if you are hosting rsps i would not recommend it.

Anything on the legal side… enjoy your amazing palace for your website.

Read full topic
item.source: What do you guys think of this webhost?

I worked with someone who had hosting with them for quite a while a few years ago. There didn’t seem to be anything wrong with them, however I’d take it with a pinch of salt and understand that unlimited doesn’t mean unlimited.
